ProjectSummary.Name: Single cell box culvert with stop logss construction
ProjectSummary.Objective: Improving irrigation system in order to inceasing agricultural products and to enhance local living condition

Evironmental_Safeguard.Impact: This area is in environmental watchlist.
Evironmental_Safeguard.Reason: This project required environment study.Under environmental watchlist.
Evironmental_Safeguard.Submissiondate: The study showed that project does not harm forest wildlife habitat, cultural site, used water source and local health in the area
Evironmental_Safeguard.ApprovebyNCDDon: 28-Aug-2009 (Date Environmental Analysis Report and Environmental Management Plan sent to Safeguard Working Group (SWG) of NCDDs)

Land_Safeguard.Impact: This project required land acquisition report.Voluntary
Land_Safeguard.Reason: The concerned families voluntarily grant their parts of lands (lesser than 5%) and properties on the lands to the project

Highland_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require highland people report.
Highland_Safeguard.Reason: These villages are not in the watched list of HP
